optimized_title: KAKSS Neoprene Dumbbells Set with Stand, 19kg Cast Iron Weights Set, 2.5kg, 3kg, 4kg Dumbbells Pair Colour Coded Hex Hand Weights for Women and Men Home Gym Workouts, hexagonal dumbell set with

image_analysis.product_name: KAKSS Supreme Quality Neoprene Dumbbell With Stand 19Kg (2.5kg+3kg+4kg N Pair)
image_analysis.size: 2.5 kg, 3 kg, 4 kg dumbbell pairs (total 19 kg including all six dumbbells)
image_analysis.quantity: 6 dumbbells (2 of 2.5 kg, 2 of 3 kg, 2 of 4 kg) and 1 rack/stand
image_analysis.material: cast iron dumbbells with neoprene coating and plastic rack/stand
key_features: Easy-grip neoprene coating for a secure hold
Printed weight number on each end cap
Color-coded dumbbells for quick identification (2.5Kg Green, 3Kg Orange, 4Kg Purple)
Hexagonal shape prevents dumbbells from rolling away
Ideal for fitness classes or at-home workout routine
Includes 6 cast iron neoprene-coated dumbbells in 3 weight categories with a storage stand
image_analysis.usage: Strength training and fitness workouts at home or in classes, including exercises like curls, presses, and general toning, with organized storage on the included rack.
image_analysis.target_audience: Home fitness users, beginners to intermediate exercisers, and people attending or running fitness classes who need a compact, color-coded dumbbell set with stand.
image_analysis.ai_description: Compact KAKSS dumbbell set featuring three color-coded pairs of hexagonal neoprene weights on a black A-frame stand. Green 2.5 kg, orange 3 kg, and purple 4 kg dumbbells display clear weight markings and logos, with a molded plastic rack cradling each pair securely.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Cast iron core with thick neoprene coating resists cracking and chipping over time
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Cheap vinyl or thin-coated weights peel, rust and split after a few months of use

comparison_points.our_benefit: Hexagonal neoprene design stays put on floors and stand for safer home workouts
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Round dumbbells roll away, causing trip hazards and damaged floors in small spaces

comparison_points.our_benefit: Colour-coded 2.5kg, 3kg, 4kg with clear end-cap markings make weight changes fast
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Low-cost sets use faded prints or stickers so weights look identical and confuse users

comparison_points.our_benefit: Includes a fitted A-frame plastic rack to keep all 6 dumbbells organised and accessible
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Many budget sets arrive without a stand, leaving weights scattered and hard to store
